snippet: The police say two hip-hop performers forced a potential financial backer to buy nearly $4,000 worth of items from an Apple store in Manhattan and then demanded $50,000 in cash.
abstract: Hip-hop performers Ryan Mixon and Andres Lozano are arrested in Manhattan on charges of kidnapping and extortion after allegedly forcing a potential financial backer to buy nearly $4,000 worth of items from an Apple store in Manhattan and then demanding $50,000 in cash from him.

byline.original: By COLIN MOYNIHAN and JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN

lead_paragraph: The police say two hip-hop performers forced a potential financial backer to buy nearly $4,000 worth of items from an Apple store in Manhattan and then demanded $50,000 in cash.

headline.seo: Two Men Are Charged in Extortion Plot Involving an Apple Shopping Spree
headline.main: 2 Are Charged With Extortion and Abduction
headline.print_headline: 2 Are Charged With Extortion And Abduction
